summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding stipulations for various deposition transcripts, seeking review before sending them to the defense. The email references multiple attachments of deposition documents related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Email regarding deposition stipulations
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email with attached stipulations for various deposition transcripts, seeking review before sending them to the defense.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 28, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The email discusses stipulations for various deposition transcripts related to the Epstein case, with multiple attachments including GX_1008, GX_1005, GX_1006, and GX_1007.
The sender seeks review of the stipulations before sending them to the defense, noting a difference in how authenticity is addressed in one paragraph.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and document exchange between prosecution and defense in the Epstein case.
